transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hmm hello.
Customer: Haan ji, main yaha pe kya bol raha tha sir main Rahul baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se aapka account banega.
Customer: Haan boliye toh.
Customer: Awaaz aa rahi hai sir aapki voice break ho rahi hai bahut zyada.
Executive: Accha boliye boliye.
Customer: Ek minute aap thoda aapne ye kya hai ki ek baar login karne ke baad me baar baar logout ho jata hai, to continue mujhe mere boss se baat karni padti hai bhai OTP aaya hai, to dijiye fir ek do baar aisa hi hua.
Customer: To ye aisa kyu ho raha hai baar baar?
Customer: Main khud toh logout nahi karta hu sir.
Executive: Haan, main batata hu sir, isme kya hota hai ki jab aap login karte ho sir seller panel desktop me to tabs ke through karte ho, isme sir kya hota hai ki jab tabs ke through karte ho.
Customer: Sir aapki awaaz, awaaz, hello.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Sir awaaz thoda door se aa rahi hai sir aap.
Executive: Ye keh raha tha sir jaise ki aap agar desktop me agar login karte ho aap seller panel, thik hai?
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Executive: To usme sir woh automatic do din me do ya ek din baad ek do din baad usme apne aap logout ho jata hai, sir uska reason hai security purpose ke liye hum karte hai sir usko.
Customer: Kya hota hai, what is that?
Executive: Security purpose, security purpose ke liye sir hum use logout kar dete hai.
Customer: Accha.
Executive: Haan agar aap mobile me login karte ho. Iska solution kya hai fir?
Executive: Iska solution ye hai ki agar aap zyada try karo ki aap apne mobile me login karke rakho, mobile me agar login hoga to logout nahi hoga, lekin aap desktop pe karte ho to usme kai saare tabs hote hai jiski wajah se aap tab me login kar lete ho, to hum waha se logout kar dete hai taaki aapka jo seller ka account hai seller panel hai sir uske saath koi uski jo privacy woh maintain rahe sir.
Customer: Accha, ek baar pehle aisa nahi hota tha, teen chaar din rehta tha, teen chaar din ke baad me logout ho jata tha.
Executive: Haan sir yahi hota hoga sir ye aap sahi keh rahe ho, aapke saath ye problem face kar aa rahi hogi aapke saamne issue aa rahe honge sir iske.
Customer: Aur uske baad agar nahi main concern wahi hai mera ki bhai fir hame mujhe kya daily laptop ke upar agar main check karu login karke dekhu har roz to logout hoga ya nahi hoga?
Executive: Nahi to sir daily ka daily to nahi hota sir do teen din me agar aap login logout ho jata hai to sir aapko dobara login karna padta hai.
Customer: Haan haan nahi do teen din me hota hai, main mera ye kehna hai ki agar woh suppose inoperative raha woh, maine mere laptop ke upar open hi nahi kiya, ek ek din gap gir gaya aur do teen din ke baad me khola maine, okay to fir woh logout ho waisa hota hai ya kaisa bhi main continue agar rakhta hu login fir bhi woh hone hi wala hai.
Executive: Accha sir main confirm clear kar deta hu aapka.

Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan boliye na sir.
Executive: Haan isme sir kya hai ki jaise aap ek baar login karne ke baad daily usko use karenge to aapka logout nahi hoga, jaise aapne gap le liya do din ka ek din ka, ek din ka gap le liya do din ka gap le liya to automatic logout ho jata hai.
Customer: Accha, but laptop ke upar bol rahe ho na ye?
Executive: Haan haan sir. Laptop ke upar haan hai na? Haan haan sir desktop ke upar ek baar aap login karo desktop me uske baad kya karte hai aap usko login karne ke baad.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Daily laptop se use karo to aapka logout nahi hoga.
Customer: Accha accha, okay.
Executive: Haan aur koi concern sir aapko agar koi problem face aa rahi ho services me?
Customer: Services me sir mujhe ek ye bhi puchna tha ki suppose maine jo ye images upload karke rakhi hai mere products ki batteries me ye to mujhe khali batteries ke related hi inquiries aati hai, matlab aisa jo inquiries hai woh battery ke related hi aati hai, PLC ya controller models waghaira baki ke jo products pade hue hai.
Customer: Maine upload kiye hue hai to.
Executive: Aapka question main zyada samajh nahi aa raha hai mere, jis cheez ki aapne images upload kar rakhi hai uski inquiry aa rahi hai, right?
Customer: Uski puri nahi usme se do teen product ki hi aati hai baki product ki nahi aa rahi hai mujhe sir inquiry.
Executive: Matlab aapke jo overall jo 130 ke kareeban product hai unme se sirf do teen product ki inquiry aa rahi hai baki ki nahi aa rahi hai right?
Customer: Haan ji, baki ki nahi aa rahi hai right.
Executive: Chalo usko sir complete karte hai to main aisa karta hu yaha pe aapki ek second main check kar leta hu, main apni side se check karta hu fir aapko call karta hu hai na sir.
Executive: Thik hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aapka ye same WhatsApp number hai sir jisme main abhi call kar raha hu?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Sir isme main WhatsApp pe ek message bhi drop karta hu.
Customer: Okay, sir main rakhta hu.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's account logs out frequently on desktop.

- Only receiving inquiries for a few uploaded products.



Resolution:

- Explained security feature causing automatic logouts.

- Advised using mobile app for longer login sessions.

- Executive will check the product inquiry issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after checking the issue.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- login, logout, security, product inquiry, whatsapp
